## Question 1 Harry Potter Cast 
####https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1201607/fullcredits?ref_=tt_ql_1

```{r Q1Cast}
HP_movie  <- read_html("https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1201607/fullcredits?ref_=tt_ql_1")

cast<-HP_movie %>% html_nodes("table.cast_list a")%>% html_text()

cast<-cast[cast!=""]
cast<-noquote(cast)
cast<-cast[!sapply(cast,is.null)]
cast<-gsub("[\n]","",cast)
cast<-gsub("(^[[:space:]]+|[[:space:]]+$)", "", cast)
cast<-as.data.frame(cast)
Cast.Name<-cast[seq(1,nrow(cast),2),]
```
